error.alert-message-suffix: Sorry for the inconvenience, contact us with this error code so that we can help you : {code}
error.api-needed: An API is needed for this un-mocked call
error.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address
error.unknown: An unexpected error happened, sorry for that.

login.no-account: I don't have an account yet
login.welcome: Welcome to Green is better order app ! Please sign in or register a free account to use it.

pick.you-can-pick-n-bases: You can pick a base | You can pick {n} bases
pick.you-can-pick-n-deserts: You can choose one desert | You can choose {n} deserts
pick.you-can-pick-n-drinks: You can choose a drink | You can choose {n} drinks
pick.you-can-pick-n-drinks-or-n-deserts: You can pick one drink or one desert | You can pick {n} of these
pick.you-can-pick-n-ingredients-or-more: You can pick one ingredient | You can pick {n} ingredients
pick.you-can-pick-n-sauces: You can pick one sauce | You can pick {n} sauces
pick.you-can-pick-n-wraps-or-n-soups: You can pick a wrap or a soup | You can choose {n} of these
